attributes.title: smelly 👻😒🤢
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app five weeks ago, but my flip phone apparently didn't have enough space for it? 😖 uncool, broz. first, you make the app packing so i can't download it for WEEKS, and then when i get the app all i see is "enter mobile phone number," as if the only phone that works right now ISN'T a landline 🧚‍♀️🙈 i'm so disappointed in the trump administration‼️ for making this app so large. and that's not even the biggest issue!! 
one day i was walking my dog while on the app and he got hit by a car! 😭😭 the trump admin app has KILLED MY DOG. i only wish there was such a thing as negative reviews... i'd leave one if possible 😰
